src/ESRingBuffer.cc

00001 /*
00002   A ring buffer for the Storage Manager Event Server
00003   Serialized events are stored (EventMsg). The size of the
00004   buffer can be given in the constructor but the max size
00005   of each event is hardwired to 7MB (actually 7000000).
00006     This is used by the Storage Manager FragmentCollector.
00007   When the ring buffer is full it the oldest event gets
00008   overwritten.
00009 
00010   30 Mar 2006 - HWKC - First implementation.
00011 */
00012 #include "EventFilter/StorageManager/interface/ESRingBuffer.h"
00013 
00014 #include "FWCore/Utilities/interface/DebugMacros.h"
00015 
00016 using namespace stor;
00017 using namespace edm;
00018 using namespace std;
00019 
00020 ESRingBuffer::ESRingBuffer(unsigned int size):
00021   maxsize_(size), head_(0), tail_(0), nextfree_(0),
00022   ring_buffer_(maxsize_), ring_totmsgsize_(maxsize_)
00023 {
00024   for (int i=0; i<(int)maxsize_; i++)
00025     ring_buffer_[i].reserve(MAX_EVTBUF_SIZE);
00026 }
00027 
00028 edm::EventMsg ESRingBuffer::pop_front()
00029 {
00030   // check to see if empty - what to return?
00031   // calling code needs to check ifEmpty() and do appropriate thing
00032   // should really return a message an appropriate MsgCode
00033   if(isEmpty()) return edm::EventMsg(&ring_buffer_[head_][0]);
00034 
00035   edm::EventMsg popthis(&ring_buffer_[head_][0],ring_totmsgsize_[head_]);
00036   if(head_ == (int)maxsize_-1) head_ = 0;
00037   else head_++;
00038   // see if now empty and need to move the tail
00039   if(head_ == nextfree_) tail_ = head_;
00040   FDEBUG(10) << "after pop_front head = " << head_ << " tail = " << tail_
00041              << " next free = " << nextfree_ << endl;
00042   FDEBUG(10) << "popping event = " << popthis.getEventNumber() << endl;
00043   FDEBUG(10) << "pop_front msg event size " << popthis.totalSize() << std::endl;
00044   return popthis;
00045 }
00046 
00047 void ESRingBuffer::push_back(edm::EventMsg msg)
00048 {
00049   // see if full and need to move the head
00050   if(isFull()) {
00051     if(head_ == (int)maxsize_-1) head_ = 0;
00052     else head_++;
00053   }
00054   // use the correct total message size msgSize() instead of msg.totalSize()
00055   // which is always set to 7000000 by FragmentCollector
00056   edm::EventMsg em(&ring_buffer_[nextfree_][0],msg.msgSize(),
00057               msg.getEventNumber(),msg.getRunNumber(),
00058               1,1);
00059   unsigned char* pos = (unsigned char*)em.data();
00060   int dsize = msg.getDataSize();
00061   unsigned char* from=(unsigned char*)msg.data();
00062   copy(from,from+dsize,pos);
00063   ring_totmsgsize_[nextfree_]=em.totalSize();
00064 
00065   tail_ = nextfree_;
00066   if(tail_ == (int)maxsize_-1) nextfree_ = 0;
00067   else nextfree_++;
00068   FDEBUG(10) << "after push_back head = " << head_ << " tail = " << tail_
00069              << " next free = " << nextfree_ << endl;
00070 }
00071 
00072 bool ESRingBuffer::isEmpty()
00073 {
00074   return ((head_ == tail_) && (head_ == nextfree_));
00075 }
00076 
00077 bool ESRingBuffer::isFull()
00078 {
00079   return ((head_ != tail_) && (head_ == nextfree_));
00080 }
